public class ArcImsVectorialEditableAdapter
extends com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.edition.VectorialEditableAdapter

We need to override one method to avoid an index problem with ArcIMS vector layers, but keeping a VectorialEditableAdapter because we need it to create the ProjectTable (?).

Author:
jldominguez

                                                                    throws com.hardcode.gdbms.driver.exceptions.ReadDriverException
Makes an spatial query returning a feature iterator over the features which intersects or are contained in the rectangle query. Applies a restriction to the alphanumeric fields returned by the iterator.
